verbs.description: some [V: expired] [ARG1: epipens] may still be good for a few months the fda says some epipen auto - injectors may still be good for four months beyond their expiration date the fda said so people can use them to cover spot shortages fda dr janet woodcock epipen epinephrine food and drug administration
